trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when there is a syntax error in XML parsing.
trans-unit.target: XML 分析中存在语法错误时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: XmlSyntaxException uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: XmlSyntaxException 使用默认<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支持引用相等性的实现。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of XmlSyntaxException, see the constructor.
trans-unit.target: XmlSyntaxException 的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref>使用默认属性的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.</xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"Invalid syntax."|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"语法无效。"|</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref> class with the line number where the exception was detected.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref>类异常检测到的行号。

trans-unit.source: The line number of an XML stream is updated whenever a newline character is detected.
trans-unit.target: 当检测到换行字符时，将更新的 XML 流的行号。

trans-unit.source: Numbering begins with 1 for the first line.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 开始编号的第一行。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.</xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"Invalid syntax on line `lineNumber`."|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"在行上的无效语法`lineNumber`。"|</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The line number of the XML stream where the XML syntax error was detected.
trans-unit.target: XML 流中检测到的 XML 语法错误的行号。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.</xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref> class with a specified error message and the line number where the exception was detected.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和异常检测到的行号的类。

trans-unit.source: The line number of an XML stream is updated whenever a newline character is detected.
trans-unit.target: 当检测到换行字符时，将更新的 XML 流的行号。

trans-unit.source: Numbering begins with 1 for the first line.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 开始编号的第一行。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.</xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"Invalid syntax on line `lineNumber` - `message` "|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"在行上的无效语法`lineNumber` - `message` "|</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The line number of the XML stream where the XML syntax error was detected.
trans-unit.target: XML 流中检测到的 XML 语法错误的行号。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.</xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
